Locations.Name: Entrance Hall
Locations.Description: A grand hall. Doors lead north and east.

Locations.Name: Library
Locations.Description: Books and more books. A door leads south.

Locations.Name: Storage Room
Locations.Description: Dusty and full of debris. Doors lead west and north.

Locations.Name: Treasure Room
Locations.Description: Dimly lit, a chest sits in the corner. There is an exit to the south.

Locations.Name: Hole
Locations.Description: Maybe you shouldn't have come down here. There's no way out.
